description: Red-team regression cases for Research Quality Guardrails V3. CI/run fails if a dangerous case passes.

cases.description: Project with 0 findings must not pass evidence gate (must not reach done)
Claim supported by only 1 source must not be is_verified in claim_ledger
Claim with disputed marking must have is_verified=false
[VERIFIED] only from claim_ledger deterministically, not from LLM free text
Brain context must exclude quarantined/rejected findings (only accepted)
